name: vscode-export-for-ai-chat
description: Copies the current fileâ€™s content to the clipboard in a format that is suitable for pasting into an AI chat.
author: Jaid <jaid.jsx@gmail.com> (https://github.com/Jaid)

export-for-ai-chat.template.markdownDescription: Handlebars template for the AI chat prompt. Available variables: `code`, `languageId`, `language.title`, `language.codeBlockId`, `isWholeFile`, `codeOpener`, `codeCloser`, `blankLine`, `newLine`
export-for-ai-chat.template.description: Handlebars template for the AI chat prompt. Available variables: code, languageId, language.title, language.codeBlockId, isWholeFile, codeOpener, codeCloser, blankLine, newLine

export-for-ai-chat.showNotifications.description: Show notifications after copying code to clipboard

scripts.package: npm run build && cp license.txt out/webpack && cd out/webpack && vsce package
